verbs.description: SINGAPORE ( AP ) — [ARG0: Former NBA star Dennis Rodman] [ARGM-MNR: openly] [V: wept] [ARGM-LOC: on television] [ARGM-LOC: in a live interview from Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARGM-TMP: as President Donald Trump and North Korea 's Kim Jong Un met]
SINGAPORE ( AP ) — Former NBA star Dennis Rodman openly wept on television in a live interview from Singapore on Tuesday as [ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] [V: met]
